3.name: Natural_Talent

Gain 0.8 + 0.18 per level Attack Damage, and 1.2 + 0.27 per level Ability Power (+4 Attack Damage and 6 Ability Power at level 18)

4.name: Bounty_Hunter
description: Deal 1% increased damage for each unique enemy champion you have killed

4.name: Oppressor

6.name: Warlord%27s_Bloodlust
description: Gain increasingly more Life Steal based on your missing health against champions (up to 20%). Against minions gain 50% benefit (25% for ranged champions).

6.name: Fervor_of_Battle
description: Hitting champions with attacks and abilities generates a Fervor stack (2 for melee attacks, 2 second cooldown for ability hits). Stacks of Fervor last 6 seconds (max 8 stacks).Your basic attacks deal 1-14 bonus physical damage to champions for each stack.

6.name: Deathfire_Touch
description: Your damaging abilities cause enemy champions to take magic damage over 4 seconds.Damage: 8 + 60% Bonus Attack Damage and 25% Ability PowerDeathfire Touch's duration is reduced for:     - Area of Effect: 2 second duration.      - Damage over Time: 1 second duration.

description: Buffs from neutral monsters last 15% longer

2.name: Assassin

2.name: Secret_Stash
description: Your Potions and Elixirs last 10% longer.Your Health Potions are replaced with Biscuits that restore 15 Health and Mana instantly on use

description: Deal 1% increased damage to champions below 40% Health

4.name: Bandit
description: Gain 1 gold for each nearby minion killed by an ally. Gain 3 gold (10 if melee) when hitting an enemy champion with a basic attack (5 second cooldown)

4.name: Dangerous_Game
description: Champion kills and assists restore 5% of your missing Health and Mana

5.name: Precision

6.name: Stormraider%27s_Surge
description: Dealing 30% of a champion's max Health within 2.5 seconds grants you 40% Movement Speed and 75% Slow Resistance for 3 seconds (10 second cooldown).

6.name: Thunderlord%27s_Decree
description: Your 3rd attack or damaging spell against the same enemy champion calls down a lightning strike, dealing magic damage in the area. Damage: 10 per level, plus 30% of your Bonus Attack Damage, and 10% of your Ability Power (25-15 second cooldown, based on level).

6.name: Windspeaker%27s_Blessing
description: Your heals and shields are 10% stronger. Additionally, your shields and heals on other allies increase their armor by 5-22 (based on level) and their magic resistance by half that amount for 3 seconds.

6.name: Grasp_of_the_Undying
description: Every 4 seconds in combat, your next attack against an enemy champion deals damage equal to 3% of your max Health and heals you for 1.5% of your max Health (halved for ranged champions, deals magic damage)

6.name: Strength_of_the_Ages
description: You permanently gain Health (300 max) for you or allies killing certain nearby units: - Siege minions: +20 Health - Large monsters: +10 HealthAt the max bonus, these kills instead restore 6% of your Maximum Health.

6.name: Bond_of_Stone
description: +4% Damage Reduction. 6% of the damage from enemy champions taken by the nearest allied champion is dealt to you instead. Damage is not redirected if you are below 5% of your maximum health.
